channel.title: [BeyondRSC]Npc viewing problem
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I recently started to look at beyond rsc source to get a little more knowledge on the way rsc private servers work, I came across a bug with the npc viewing and wanted to know if anyone could point me into the right directions into fixing this, When right clicking>view npc at times it looks like :
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/10/screenshot0bv.png/][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/3599/screenshot0bv.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img694.imageshack.us/i/screenshot1ux.png/][IMG]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/9900/screenshot1ux.th.png[/img][/URL]
Edit: There is only two shop keepers in the shop/xml, As already checked.
Anyone got any ideas to point me into the right directions?(Not spoon feed)
Thanks.

item.title: [BeyondRSC]Npc viewing problem
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

NPC spawns are located in NpcLoc.xml

Read full topic
